stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains the Soviet Unionâ€™s creation of the Warsaw Pact and COMECON?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the emergence of two superpowers.

choicesHtml: The Soviet desire to impose communism in Western Europe by military force
Soviet efforts to force Western European states to abandon their overseas empires
Soviet reaction to the creation of similar organizations in Western Europe
Soviet attempts to gain greater influence in the newly established United Nations
